en.value:
Find out more about a career with the European Union at the European Personnel Selection Office (EPSO) website.

Who we employ

Careers at EU-OSHA are open to nationals of the 28 European Union (EU) member states plus Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway (parties of the EEA agreement).

EU-OSHA is an equal opportunities employer. We consider candidates for employment without distinction on the grounds of age, race, political, philosophical or religious conviction, gender or sexual orientation and regardless of disabilities, marital status or family situation. 

Job vacancies

Job vacancies

en.value: At EU-OSHA, our staff enjoy a stimulating and multinational work environment. Our offices are located in the culturally vibrant city of Bilbao. There are all kinds of posts at EU-OSHA, but all our employees — from project managers to communications officers and administrators — have the skills, passion and enthusiasm we need to help us make Europe a safer, healthier and more productive place to work.
